positions.name: DevOps Tech Lead
description: Provide overall technical direction for DevOps practices
Manage tasks for cross national teams
examples: Introduced a shared repository for reusable GitHub Actions to replace deployment shell scripts
Advised the creation of operation review checksheet for new services
Created guidelines for database schema migrations
Started a dashboard showing deployment status and health of all services to encourage CI/CD
Developed sample code with clean architecture for a service with technical debt
Improved CD with Flux by introducing automated pull requests to deploy
key_metrics: Reduced setup time for new CI/CD pipelines by 50% with shared GitHub Actions
Reduced deployment lead time from hours to minutes with automated pull requests

positions.name: DevOps Engineer
description: Improving of process of software development
Provide technical support to development teams
examples: Creation of CI/CD pipeline templates
Creation of testing framework templates
Provided machine learning pipeline proof of concepts with Argo workflows on Kubernetes
Provided event-driven autoscaling proof-of-concepts in Kubernetes KEDA
Created tooling to automate the creation of mock services for integration testing
key_metrics: Reduced cloud computing costs by over 50% with event-driven autoscaling
Improved deployment success rate and frequency with CI/CD pipelines

positions.name: Backend Engineer
description: Development of a PaaS cloud platform
examples: Design, implementation, and operation of a B2B marketplace
Design & development of external facing APIs
Coordinating with adjacent teams for feature integration
Improved developer productivity by simplifying unit tests
Managed security development lifecycle of the platform
key_metrics: Reduced unit test cyclomatic complexity by an order of magnitude (hundreds to tens)
Reduced API latency by over 50% with optimized database queries

positions.name: Engineer
description: Maintenance and development internal company infrastructure
Containerization and deployment of machine learning models
Creating proposals for clients seeking technical consultations
examples: Creation and operation of vpns for edge devices
Rearchitectured an auto-scaling cloud AI application for scoring workouts via video feed
key_metrics: Improved cloud AI performance by at least 100% by rewriting compute-intensive code in Cython
Reduced cloud AI latency by at least 50% by optimizing video processing pipeline

positions.name: Full-stack Engineer
description: Development of a travel planning mobile app
examples: Created a mobile app with Flutter
Implemented a REST backend with Go
Working towards official release, currently in closed beta

positions.name: Full-stack web developer
description: Designed, proposed, and implemented new features for existing web applications
examples: Created Vue frontend and Ruby backends for search autocompletion
Refactored static search page to single page application
Implemented free text search that matched to existing database tags
Deployed web crawlers on AWS Lambda
